ComicInfo.Summary:
The ODD JOB epic begins in a new ongoing James Bond comic series by superstars GREG PAK (Planet Hulk, Mech Cadet Yu) and MARC LAMING (Star Wars, Wonder Woman)! Agent 007 tracks a smuggler into Singapore to secure a dangerous case, contents unknown. But a Korean mystery man wants the case as well, for very different reasons. And if Bond and this new rival don’t kill each other, the ruthless terrorist organization known as ORU will be more than happy to finish the job.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Dave Johnson | 1 | B | Cover B | John Cassaday & José Villarrubia | 2 | C | Cover C | Rafael Albuquerque | 3 | D | Cover D | Marc Laming | 4 | E/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Dave Johnson | 5 | F/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | John Cassaday | 6 | G/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Rafael Albuquerque | 7 | H/RI | 1:40 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Dave Johnson | 8 | I/RI | 1:50 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | John Cassaday | 9 | J/RE | Atlas Comics Signature Series Variant Cover | Dave Johnson | 10 |
